NEIGH Name: Maldens and Coombe

AIRCZ Type: AIRPORT
Description: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)
Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

HWTERR Type: TERRIER
Description: P

HWTERR Type: TERRIER
Description: P

LBCASE LB Address: MIRAMONTE
WARREN RISE
COOMBE
LB Grade: GD2
LB Ref: 4/3

description:
F.1 Olive - Exempt.
T.3 Lime (larger of 2) - Remove dead branch.
F.3 Sorbus - Fell (Dead).
T.9 Beech - Laterally reduce one large limb facing towards Field Maple by approx. 2m.
T.G & T.H - Exempt
T.F Laurus - Exempt
T.35 & T.37 Chamaecyparis - Exempt.
T.J Yew x 3 - 1-2m Holistic reduction.
T.K London Plane - To remove 2 crossing branches from the right-hand Plane tree.
T.14 Robinia - Reduce by 600mm  deadwood.
T.L Cotoneaster - Exempt.
T.17 & T.18 Quercus Ilex - To reduce the left-hand side one by 2m and the right-hand side one by 1m and trim the overhang to the verge.
T.13 Quercus Ilex - 1.5m Crown reduction.
T.23 Prunus pissardii - 600mm Lateral Reduction over the road.
T.26 Holly - 600mm Lateral Reduction over the road.
F.4 Rhus - Exempt.
T.24 & T.25 Cherry - 600mm reduction & formally train.
T.29 - Robinia - Trim to previous levels.
